titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the personal holding company tax.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/3/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) repeal part II (Personal Holding Companies) of subchapter G (Corporations Used to Avoid Income Tax on Shareholders); and (2) revise provisions concerning the dividend received deduction of closely held corporations.
